overview:
## Discussion

If the receiver object doesn’t have any suboperations, [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/fractionCompleted] is generally the result of dividing [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/completedUnitCount] by [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/totalUnitCount]. Setting both [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/totalUnitCount] and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/completedUnitCount] properties to zero indicates that there is no progress to track. In this case, the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/isIndeterminate] property returns [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] and the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/fractionCompleted] property returns `0.0`.

If the receiver does have suboperations, [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/fractionCompleted] reflects progress from those progress objects in addition to its own [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/completedUnitCount]. When the suboperations finish, the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/completedUnitCount] of the containing progress object updates.

# fractionCompleted

**Instance Property**

The fraction of the overall work that the progress object completes, including work from its suboperations.

## Declaration

```swift
var fractionCompleted: Double { get }
```

## Discussion

If the receiver object doesn’t have any suboperations, [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/fractionCompleted] is generally the result of dividing [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/completedUnitCount] by [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/totalUnitCount]. Setting both [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/totalUnitCount] and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/completedUnitCount] properties to zero indicates that there is no progress to track. In this case, the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/isIndeterminate] property returns [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] and the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/fractionCompleted] property returns `0.0`.

If the receiver does have suboperations, [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/fractionCompleted] reflects progress from those progress objects in addition to its own [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/completedUnitCount]. When the suboperations finish, the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/completedUnitCount] of the containing progress object updates.

## Observing Progress

- **isIndeterminate**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the tracked progress is indeterminate.
- **isFinished**: A Boolean value that indicates the progress object is complete.
